name: Bones and Metal
description:
Defend yourself from swarms of skeletons with the power of Metal.

Killing enemies fills your charge meter. Using the push special uses 1 charge bar. Using the slide special uses 3 charge bars.

Shoot the bell in the tower at the center of the level to start the next wave.

Default Controls:

  • W A S D - Move
  • Space - Jump
  • Hold Shift - Power slide in the direction you are looking at
  • Left click - Shoot
  • Right click - Power chord push
  • Right click while sliding - Power slide with explosions
  • 1/2/3 - Switch fire mode (machine gun / shotgun / flakker)

Enemies drop souls, souls are used for the third fire mode (uses 10 ammo).

Music: Vargskelethor - The Bone Zone ( Instrumental )
